Package net.cloud.gfx.elements

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Container<T extends Element>
    Interface for Container-like elements.
    Element
    A graphic element.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractButton
    A generic base class for buttons elements.
    AbstractElement
    A functional and stand-alone implementation of the Element interface.
    Button
    A plain button.
    CenteredText
    Simple text element which extends on the abilities of the plain Text label by centering the text within the drawing area of this element.
    Checkbox
    A checkbox is a box which well..
    ElementList
    A list of Element objects.
    ElementListTest
    Test the ElementList data type.
    HorizontalView
    A container that shows all of the elements within it.
    HorizontalView.HorizontalViewElement
    Decorator that adds two fields to an element that's been added to the view.
    ImageButton
    A button which is represented only by an image, with no label.
    Interface
    An Interface is an element which contains child elements and behaves just like a Container, except that it will actually draw all of the child elements as-is.
    ParentElement
    Fooled you! This isn't really an element.
    PasswordField
    A text field where rather than showing the actual text in the field, asterisks are used instead.
    PriorityContainer
    This abstract class is an element which contains other elements.
    RadioButton
    A radio button is the circular counterpart to a checkbox.
    RadioButton.RadioButtonEvent
    Rather than cram lots of parameters into a Consumer, just wrap them in a single object...
    RadioButton.RadioButtonGroup
    A logical grouping of Radio Buttons.
    ReferenceText
    For when some text element will need to be updated, but there is no convenient event to base the text update on.
    ScrollView
    A ScrollView is an element which contains a single other element.
    SelectableButton
    A base class for selectable buttons, such as checkboxes and radio buttons.
    Sprite
    A Sprite is an image being shown in the game.
    TestElement
    Element useful for testing.
    Text
    Analogous to the JLabel.
    TextArea
    A text area is a block of text.
    TextField
    A generic text field.
    TiledSprite
    A sprite which has its image tiled to match the width and height of the element.
    VerticalView
    A container that shows all of the elements within it.
    VerticalView.VerticalViewElement
    Decorator that adds two fields to an element that's been added to the view.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Alignment
    Alignment of a graphic element.
    ScrollView.BarVisibility
    A simple enum, scroll bars may either always be showing or only show when they would be needed.
